name: Gluten-Free Pumpkin Date Bars
author: Aubrey Velin
summary: These delicious pumpkin date bars are gluten free! They are a good source of protein and a great snack for work, school, and more!
ingredients: ½ cup coarsely chopped gluten-free pretzels
directions: Preheat the oven to 350 degrees F (175 degrees C)
Line a large cookie sheet with parchment paper
Gently mix oats, dates, hazelnuts, almonds, raisins, cranberries, pretzels, and chia seeds in a large bowl
Mix water and flax seeds together in a small bowl
Let stand until thickened, about 5 minutes
Mix pumpkin puree, bananas, and honey together in a medium bowl
Gently mix into the oat mixture until soft and evenly combined
Spread onto the cookie sheet in an even 1/2-inch layer
Bake in the preheated oven until browned but still slightly gooey, 25 to 33 minutes
Let cool before cutting into bars
